org.pircbotx.hooks.types

Interface GenericDCCEvent<T extends PircBotX>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericEvent<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileTransferFinishedEvent, IncomingChatRequestEvent, IncomingFileTransferEvent

    public interface GenericDCCEvent<T extends PircBotX>
extends GenericEvent<T>
    Any event dealing with DCC. This includes chat and file transfers. This is more of a marker event then anything else as DCC events don't have much in common
    Author:
    Leon Blakey

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.pircbotx.hooks.types.GenericEvent

        getBot, getTimestamp, respond
